radiobutton.label: Warning appears when this action is selected from List page where multiple records are shown and no particular record is selected
This is an action that must be invoked by user in the UI
Associate to launch entry to enable launch in context

helpgrid.innerhtml: You can configure autofill properties to use cached data instead of server data. You can configure type-ahead so that users see matches for a field as they type. You must configure type-ahead before you can configure set values and filters.

You can configure autofill properties to use cached data instead of server data. You can configure type-ahead so that users see matches for a field as they type. You must configure type-ahead before you can configure set values and filters.

statictext.label: Select the type of app you wish to create.

helpgrid.innerhtml: Configure type-ahead in a field so that as users enter data, they can choose from a list of options based on the information available in the server.
Click New Row and enter a domain attribute to configure type-ahead. You must save the application definition to save the type-ahead configuration.

Configure set values so that can you select a type-ahead choice to set the value in another field. For example, after you have configured type-ahead on the Asset field, you can configure the Location field to be filled with information based on the value that you enter in the Asset field.

In the To Attribute field, specify an attribute that corresponds to the field where you want the value to be set. In the Domain Attribute field, specify the domain attribute of the field where the set value comes from.

You can configure filters to limit the type-ahead choices for a field based on the data in another field. For example, after you have configured type-ahead on the Asset field, you can configure a filter in the Location field to determine which type-ahead choices are available in the Asset field.

In the From Attribute field, specify the field that you want to act as a filter for the type-ahead choices. In the Domain Attribute field, specify the domain attribute of the field with the type-ahead choices.
